= Search Engines for use in Chrome search bar =

[[/index|Back to Index]]

To configure in Chrome, right click on the search bar
select "Edit Search Engines" and then, after the
Default engines, select Add.

For a list of engines see
https://github.com/daturkel/custom-search-engines

Note that as of v88.0.4324.150, Chrome has stopped recognizing
customer searches by default:
https://www.reddit.com/r/chrome/comments/lilkij/custom_automatic_searches_not_working/
Solution: Go to chrome://flags/#omnibox-keyword-search-button and disable

 Note that for Chrome, keywords are case-insensitive

Search CACR website
cacr: https://encrypted.google.com/search?q=%s+site%3Ahttps%3A%2F%2Fcacr.iu.edu%2F CACR

Search my Google drive
gd: https://drive.google.com/drive/search?q=%s Google Drive

Search Github
gh: https://github.com/search?q=%s&ref=opensearch Github

Search Hammerspoon documentation
hs: https://encrypted.google.com/search?q=%s+site%3Ahttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.hammerspoon.org%2Fdocs%2F Hammerspoon

Search on www.iu.edu (using "iu" blocks my broader searchs for IU stuff)
www-iu: http://www.iu.edu/search/index.shtml?q=%s&cse-search-submit=Go&cx=016278320858612601979%3Addl1l9og1w8&ie=UTF-8&nojs=1 IU

Search IU Scholarworks
iusw: https://scholarworks.iu.edu/dspace/discover?scope=%2F&query=%s&submit=Go

Search Python 3.4 documentatnion
